price: 98. Celui qui est l’ennemi d’Allah, de Ses Anges, de Ses Messagers, de Gabriel et de Michaël, (qu’il sache qu’) Allah est l’ennemi des mécréants.
arabic: مَن كَانَ عَدُوّٗا لِّلَّهِ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَجِبۡرِيلَ وَمِيكَىٰلَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَدُوّٞ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: man kāna ʿaduwwan lillahi wamalāikatihi warusulihi wajib'rīla wamīkāla fa-inna al-laha ʿaduwwun lil'kāfirīna
